entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
